contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement <!--more fields are available for this Infobox--See Template:Infobox Settlement--> |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_region = RO |subdivision_type = [[Countries of the world|Country]] |subdivision_name = {{ROU}} |timezone=[[Eastern European Time|EET]] |utc_offset=+2 |timezone_DST=[[Eastern European Summer Time|EEST]] |utc_offset_DST=+3 |map_caption = Location of Hârlău| official_name=Hârlău| image_shield=| |pushpin_map =Romania |pushpin_label_position = <!-- the position of the pushpin label: left, right, top, bottom, none --> |pushpin_map_caption =Location of Hârlău |pushpin_mapsize = |image_map=|| |subdivision_type1=[[Counties of Romania|County]]| subdivision_name1=Iaşi County| |subdivision_type2=[[Subdivisions of Romania|Status]]| subdivision_name2={{Autolink|Town}} |settlement_type=Town|| |leader_title=[[Mayor]]| leader_name=Cernescu Constantin| leader_party=[[Social Democratic Party (Romania)|Social Democratic Party]]| area_total_km2=40.36| population_as_of=2002| population_total=11942|latd=47|latm=25|lats=40|latNS=N|longd=26|longm=54|longs=41|longEW=E|| website= }} '''Hârlău''' (also spelled ''Hîrlău'', {{IPA-ro|hɨrˈləw}}; {{lang-he|חרלאו}}, {{lang-de|Harlau}}, {{lang-hu|Harló}}) is a town in [[Iaşi County]], [[Moldavia]], [[Romania]]. {{As of|2004}} the estimated population is 11,271. It was the capital city of Moldova in the 15th century. One village, Pârcovaci, is administered by the town. ==Population== The 2011 census counted 10,055 inhabitants, 93.85% [[Romanians]] and 6.06% [[Romani people|Roma]]. A large [[Jewish]] minority used to live in Hârlău. {| border=1 align=left cellpadding=2 cellspacing=0 style="border-collapse:collapse;border:1px solid black;font-size:100%; text-align:right;" |- style="background:#efefef;" ! Year !! align=center |Number !! % of Jews in the General Population |- |1803 ||align=center | 784 || |- |1838||align=center | 1,008 || |- |1859||align=center | 1,389|| |- |1886 ||align=center | 2,254||align=center | 56.6 |- |1899||align=center | 2,718 ||align=center | 59.9 |- |1910||align=center | 2,023 || |- |1930||align=center | 2,032 || align=center | 22.3 |- |1941||align=center | 1,736 || align=center | 18.0 |- |1942 ||align=center | 1,300 || |- |1947 ||align=center | 1,936 || |- |2004 ||align=center | 11,271 || |- |} <br clear=left> ==References== {{Reflist}} *The General Archive of The History of The Jewish People. RM 160, 164. ==External links== {{commons category}} {{Iaşi County}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Harlau}} [[Category:Towns in Romania]] [[Category:Populated places in Iaşi County]] {{Iaşi-geo-stub}}
